set-language.title: Document Language
set-language.body-text: Setting the document language enables screen readers to read content with appropriate pronunciation.

download.accessibility-prompt-text: Ensure that your design is accessible to everyone.
download.option-png-description: Ideal for small files. Limited accessibility.
download.option-png-hd-description: Ideal for large or complex files. Limited accessibility.
download.option-interactive-pdf-description: Ideal for accessibility, hyperlinks, and printing.
download.tooltip-text-pdf: PDFs can be made accessible for screen readers and other assistive technology.

share-panel.view-only-text: Anyone with the link can view only.
